title: Jesmyn Ward on 'Sing, Unburied, Sing'
description: Ward discusses her new novel; David Dobbs on five new books about Darwin; and Kristin Cashore talks about “Jane, Unlimited.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
content:encoded: Ward discusses her new novel; David Dobbs on five new books about Darwin; and Kristin Cashore talks about “Jane, Unlimited.”
